title: Battlecast prime Cho Gath
body:
When you toggle his E, the missile bays properly close.

But the animation doesn't play when they open. They just clip open

replies.body:
Hey Blackfist 5050, thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's up with that animation.

EDIT: Would you happen to have a .gif or a screenshot?

I checked this myself last night and I was just coming to second this report.

I compared what I saw in-game to a video of the skin ( [source](https://youtu.be/X_aVyShT8lw?t=48s) ') and it definitely looks like it is skipping animation frames.

I took a video toggling it and played it step-by-by; here is the frame-step before I press E
